name: Vulcan
overview: Vulcan, Inc. manufactures and distributes sign products. It offers fabricated aluminum products; aluminum blanks, aluminum sign blanks, aluminum sheet, extruded blades, sign blanks for traffic signs, and street name sign blanks; and metal stamping from simple blanking dies to progressive dies. The company also provides traffic control signs for highways and construction; custom signs for airports, industrial facilities, parks, recreational areas, and schools; sign posts and installation accessories; sign mounting brackets and hardware; roadway marking products for various roadway and parking facility applications; decals for vehicle markings; street name signs; workzone products for highway construction and maintenance; raised pavement markers for various roadway and parking facility applications; and road signs for local and state governments, and private developments. In addition, it offers aerial markers, aluminum vents, barricades, brackets and hardware, bullet markers, cathodic DRV markers, cathodic markers, cathodic test heads, DAS markers, decals, DRV markers, electronic markers, facility identification signs, fleet markings, hazardous material warnings, industrial signs, low profile markers, mesh roll-up signs, pavement markers, post clamps, river crossing signs, up signs, posts, flags, products, signs, safety vests, security signs, posts, temporary markings, cones, control signs, channel posts, tapes, markers, and work zone products. Further, the company implements traffic control device asset management systems for transportation agencies. It serves communications, electrical power, pipelines, traffic, and water/wastewater industries. Vulcan, Inc. was formerly known as Vulcan Signs & Stampings, Inc. and changed its name to Vulcan, Inc. in March 1982. The company was founded in 1935 and is headquartered in Foley, Alabama.
